Definition at line 23 of file spacemission.php.

$_hasMany [protected]
Initial value:
 array (
        'research_areas' => '',
        'targets' => '',
        'sensors' => '',
        'scientific_contacts' => '',
        'science_goals')

Array of all 1-N relations: 1 space mission can have N entries 1 sensor can have N scientific contacts/science goals key is target table, value are foreign keys
